statement.p: For the right triangle below, find the length of c.

A triangle. Going around counterclockwise, an angle is unlabeled and its opposite side is labeled 12 yd. An angle is labeled 49 degrees. An angle has a right angle symbol and its opposite side is labeled c.

p.em: Enter the value for \displaystyle{c} (accurate to at least two decimal places) and include the units of measure.
